Member Function Documentation

void BtApplicationServiceVerifyRequest::OnRequestStateChange (  BtRequestState  old_request_state,
BtRequestState  new_request_state
)  [protected, virtual]
 

Request state change handling member function.

The OnRequestStateChange will allways be invoked when the processing state of this request changes. This function is used to carry out some reactions to the change. It is an pure virtual function and all subsequent (inherited) requests therefore are abstract classes. So the application programmer has to derive the partikular request from the class that fullfills the request and must implement this function. After that the application progammer can use his request to initiate an request at the Bluetooth stack.

Parameters:
old_request_state A BtRequstState containing the state of the request before the change took place.
new_request_state A BtRequstState containing the state of the request after the change took place.

Implements BtLocalRequest.
